SEARCH
Package control

Class InquiryController

java.lang.Object
control.InquiryController
public class InquiryController extends Object
Controls logic related to inquiries in the system. Provides methods to create, edit, delete, view, reply to, and resolve inquiries.

  • Method Details

    • createInquiry

      public static void createInquiry(String senderNRIC, String subject, Project project, String message)
      Creates and submits a new inquiry.
      Parameters:
      senderNRIC - the NRIC of the applicant submitting the inquiry
      subject - the subject of the inquiry
      project - the related project
      message - the message content

    • editInquiry

      public static void editInquiry(String senderNRIC, Inquiry inquiry, String newMessage)
      Edits an existing inquiry message if the sender matches the logged-in user.
      Parameters:
      senderNRIC - the NRIC of the user attempting to edit
      inquiry - the inquiry to be edited
      newMessage - the new message content

    • deleteInquiry

      public static void deleteInquiry(String senderNRIC, Inquiry inquiry)
      Deletes an inquiry if the sender matches the logged-in user.
      Parameters:
      senderNRIC - the NRIC of the user attempting to delete
      inquiry - the inquiry to delete

    • viewInquiries

      public static List<Inquiry> viewInquiries(String senderNRIC)
      Views all inquiries submitted by a specific user.
      Parameters:
      senderNRIC - the NRIC of the user
      Returns:
      list of inquiries submitted by the user

    • viewInquiries

      public static List<Inquiry> viewInquiries(Project project)
      Views all inquiries related to a specific project.
      Parameters:
      project - the project to filter by
      Returns:
      list of inquiries linked to the project

    • allInquiries

      public static List<Inquiry> allInquiries()
      Returns all inquiries in the system.
      Returns:
      list of all inquiries

    • getOpenInquiries

      public static List<Inquiry> getOpenInquiries()
      Returns a list of inquiries that are still open (not resolved).
      Returns:
      list of open inquiries

    • resolveInquiry

      public static void resolveInquiry(String inquiryId)
      Resolves an inquiry by setting its status and resolution time.
      Parameters:
      inquiryId - the ID of the inquiry to resolve

    • replyToInquiry

      public static void replyToInquiry(String inquiryId, String replyMessage)
      Replies to an inquiry by setting the reply message.
      Parameters:
      inquiryId - the ID of the inquiry to reply to
      replyMessage - the reply message
